verses.name: 1 Chronicles 11:16
verses.text: And David was then in the hold, and the Philistines’ garrison was then at Beth–lehem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 11:17
verses.text: And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Beth–lehem, that is at the gate!

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 11:18
verses.text: And the three brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Beth–lehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: but David would not drink of it, but poured it out to the Lord,
